subject: Baseball
College World Series
lead_paragraph: Robbie Coman’s two-run, bases-loaded single gave Virginia the lead, and Josh Sborz and two relievers limited Mississippi to six singles in a 4-1 victory Saturday in Omaha that sent the Cavaliers to the College World Series finals.
snippet: Robbie Coman’s two-run, bases-loaded single gave Virginia the lead, and Josh Sborz and two relievers limited Mississippi to six singles in a 4-1 victory Saturday in Omaha that sent the Cavaliers to the College World Series finals.
